data.title: 2024 NADO Summer Board of Directors Meeting
data.meta_description: 2024 NADO Summer Board of Directors Meeting, June 4-6, 2024, Santa Fe, NM
data.text:
June 5-6, 2024

El Dorado Hotel & Spa

309 W San Francisco St.

Santa Fe, NM 87501

The NADO Board of Directors is comprised of Executive Directors and staff of regional development organizations throughout the United States. Approximately 65 board members come to participate in the summer board meeting where they convene about NADO’s strategic plan for the organization.

When to Arrive:

NADO Executive Committee Members:

Arrive at the hotel no later than Sunday night (06/02) or Monday morning (06/03)

Golf Tournament and Peer Exchange Participants:

Arrive at the hotel no later than Monday evening (06/03)

First-time Board Members:

Arrive at the hotel no later than Tuesday afternoon (06/04)

All Others:

Arrive at the hotel no later than Tuesday evening (06/04)

Note: On Tuesday, June 4, Board Members will have the option to either participate in the golf tournament, or participate in the peer exchange. Participation in these activities is optional. Board members who do not wish to participate in either activity do not need to arrive at the hotel until the afternoon/evening of Tuesday, June 4.

Peer Exchange:

Regional Food Systems in North Central New Mexico

Tuesday, June 4, 2024

Learn about the importance of regional food systems in North Central New Mexico starting with a visit to the North Central New Mexico Economic Development District (NCNMEDD) office to hear from the New Mexico Farmers’ Marketing Association. There will also be a visit to The Table Kitchen Santa Fe and YouthWorks! — two exciting programs that promote entrepreneurism and creating job opportunities. The Kitchen Table is an accessible and affordable commercial kitchen that helps local food entrepreneurs build their businesses. Youth Works! Provides training designed for youth in a variety of fields including culinary arts.

The Peer Exchange will include lunch provided by participants in the culinary arts program at YouthWorks!

Pre-registration is required and there is an additional $50 charge to cover the transportation and the meal at YouthWorks!.

For planning purposes, included below is the draft itinerary for Tuesday, June 4:

9:30 am Meet in the lobby of the El Dorado Hotel

9:45 am Depart El Dorado Hotel

10:00 am Arrive at NCNMEDD

11:00 am Depart NCNMEDD

11:15 am Arrive at The Kitchen Table Santa Fe

12:00 pm Depart The Kitchen Table Santa Fe

12:15 pm Arrive at YouthWorks!

1:30 pm Depart YouthWorks!

1:45 pm Arrive at El Dorado Hotel
